title: Bronze Bimbo's - If you're looking Duo, Flex or Normal buddies, join our discord!
body:
Hey guys!

This is for all you boys and girls out there that either wanna chill and play some league with a bunch of mates or are looking to climb the solo/duo ladder and are in need of some buddies to play with! Just throw a message in the chat and ask for a duo, flex or normal. 

The more people who join, the easier it'll be to find people to play with! 
We have over 70 members already.

Specifically for all those Bronze - Gold players that are looking for some buddies but if you're a high elo player, come and join us for some fun!

It doesn't matter if you're not very good or don't have very good social skills, everybody is welcome!

https://discord.gg/DdYrVJd
